snippet.title: Spaceman Memories  | Official Gameplay Trailer | Indie Game JRPG | 2024
snippet.description:
Wishlist Spaceman Memories now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2354580/Spaceman_Memories/

Spaceman Memories is an upcoming indie 2.5D retro JRPG that takes place in a distant future but draws inspiration from ancient Japanese folktales and 1990s JRPG graphics. A story full of wonder and nostalgia as you take on the role of Ichiro 94, an astronaut who wakes up from hypersleep to go on a journey to find the remnants of his past.

Solo developed by NerdyPunkDev in Unreal Engine 5

For more information and to keep up to date with the latest development news, visit the NerdyPunkDev website: https://nerdypunk.dev/

NerdyPunkDev on X:  https://x.com/nerdypunkdev
Support the development on Kofi: https://ko-fi.com/nerdypunkdev
Join the NerdyPunkDev Discord: https://discord.gg/VZpnjtnHSc   
NerdyPunkDev on Instagram: https://instagram.com/nerdypunk.dev
  
#pixelart  #jrpg #indiegame
